name: Break Even
description:
Synopsis

BreakEven is a 3rd-person stealth action game inspired by the popular stealth games Thief and Dishonored. You play as Kareena, a thief for hire in a modern steampunk world.

You were hired to find a mysterious item in posession of a rich family in their old mansion. 

Invade the estate and find the possession. But beware of the guards, they throw quite a punch. Use your staff if you have to defend yourself.

Credits

2D Art by Abdu Aabed

3D Art by Dustin Dornbusch

Game Design & Project Management by Marius Kowal

Gameplay by Max Kruse

Music & Sound by Niklas Wieböker & Paul Timmich
